com.concordium.sdk

Class CurrencyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordium.sdk.CurrencyConverter

  • public class CurrencyConverter
extends Object
    Utility class for converting between CCDAmount, Energy and Euros. Represents converted values using ConversionResult to ensure precision.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CurrencyConverter()

      • energyToEuro

        public static ConversionResult<ConversionResult.EUR> energyToEuro(Energy energy,
                                                                  ChainParameters parameters)
        Converts Energy to euro using exchange rate from the provided ChainParameters.
        Parameters:
        energy - Energy to convert.
        parameters - ChainParameters with exchange rate used for conversion.
        Returns:
        ConversionResult corresponding to the euro value of Energy.
